This task involves a multi-step process to address the underlying research or evaluation question of your eventual survey. Please follow the directions below.

1. Open a blank copy of the following <img src="/logos/word-ico.png" alt="Word icon" width="50">

2. Put your name in the top left corner

3. Create a four column table with the following headers
    ```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
    ex <- tibble(
      
      question = c(NA),
      
      approach = c(NA),
      
      measure = c(NA),
      
      latent = c(NA),
      
      trustworthiness = c(NA)
       
    ) 
    ```
    
    <center>
    ```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
    ex %>%
      drop_na() %>%
      kbl("html", 
      escape = FALSE) %>%
      kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, 
                    font_size = 22,
                    html_font = "roboto condensed") %>% 
      row_spec(0, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;font-weight: 600;text-decoration:underline', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent") 
    ```
    </center>
    where the<br><br>
    
      a. <span style="font-weight:600; color:#f7f7f7; text-decoration:underline;font_size = 22;">question</span> is a possible underlying research or evaluation question that you would like to study
      
      b. <span style="font-weight:600; color:#f7f7f7; text-decoration:underline;font_size = 22;">approach</span> is a list of all possible quantitative and/or qualitative approaches you anticipate may be used to address the question 
      
      c. <span style="font-weight:600; color:#f7f7f7; text-decoration:underline;font_size = 22;">measure</span> is the direct quantitative measure
      
      d. <span style="font-weight:600; color:#f7f7f7; text-decoration:underline;font_size = 22;">latent</span> is the overall quantitative latent construct
      
      e. <span style="font-weight:600; color:#f7f7f7; text-decoration:underline;font_size = 22;">trustworthiness</span> is a short description of the essential qualitative characteristics or markers needed to assess the quality of the study<br><br>

4. Submit this document to <a target="_blank" href="https://ecampus.wvu.edu/">eCampus</a>.

<br />

<i>Please note that if you do not know or are unsure of the meaning of a direct measure, latent construct, and/or trustworthiness please include the column names but leave the values blank. We will cover these concepts later in the term</i>
